name: 高等量子力學（一）
goals: 瞭解相對論量子力學及基礎量子場論
syllabus:
1.      Week 1: Introduction to relativistic quantum mechanics

2.      Week 2: Klein Gordon equation and Maxwell equstion  

3.      Week 3: Dirac equation

4.      Week 4: Symmetry in quantum mechanics and field theories

5.      Week 5: Second quantization and Canonical quantization of scalar fields

6.      Week 6: Second quantization and Canonical quantization of spinor and vector fields

7.      Week 7: Path integral method in quantum mechanics and field theories

8.      Week 8: Path integral quantization of scalar, spinor and vector fields

9.      Week 9: Feynman rules and Feynman diagrams

10.    Week 10: Quantum fields in a non-trivial background

11.    Week 11: Regularizations and \\phi^4 theory I

12.    Week 12: Regularizations and \\phi^4 theory II

13.    Week 13: QED I

14.   Week 14: QED II

15.   Week 15: Schwinger pair creation in external electric field

16.  Week 16: Reoprt I

17.  Week 17: Reoprt II
prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
